00033 int ResponseCallback::error(int error, const String &msg) {
00034   CommHeader header;
00035   header.initialize_from_request_header(m_event_ptr->header);
00036   CommBufPtr cbp(Protocol::create_error_message(header, error, msg.c_str()));
00037   return m_comm->send_response(m_event_ptr->addr, cbp);
00038 }
00039 
00040 int ResponseCallback::response_ok() {
00041   CommHeader header;
00042   header.initialize_from_request_header(m_event_ptr->header);
00043   CommBufPtr cbp(new CommBuf(header, 4));
00044   cbp->append_i32(Error::OK);
00045   return m_comm->send_response(m_event_ptr->addr, cbp);
00046 }
